message:
OpenERP Developer

Responsibility: 
• Ability to customize and integrate ready-made core OpenERP modules such as the HR, Accounting, Warehouse, Production and Distribution, as well as improve and  develop new modules based on business requirements
• Prior experience installing, configuring, customization, implementation & Support Open ERP

Desired Qualifications:
• Preferably at least 1 year of experience
• Good knowledge and Experience with Python web application development
• Experience with OpenERP is Preferred
• Experience with relational database programming interfaces (Mysql, PostgreSQL)
• Good knowledge of object oriented programming, object modeling, relational databases, Unix/Linux platform 
• Good knowledge of HTML,CSS and Javascript
• Quick and autonomous learner, problem-solving personality, enthusiastic when faced with technical challenges
• Exposure of all phases of software development life cycle from requirement analysis to implementation including testing

Please send resume to jobs@ferrycode.com
